description: Domain weights for Mobius Integrity Index calculation

accountability_rule_of_law.label: Accountability & Rule of Law
accountability_rule_of_law.rationale: Core accountability mechanisms are foundational to integrity. Without functioning rule of law, other domains cannot operate reliably.

transparency_auditability.label: Transparency & Auditability
transparency_auditability.rationale: Transparency enables oversight but is insufficient alone. Weight reflects its enabling role rather than causal primacy.

democratic_integrity.label: Democratic Integrity
democratic_integrity.rationale: Democratic processes provide legitimacy and correction mechanisms. Weight balanced against risk of conflating democracy with integrity.

corruption_capture_risk.label: Corruption & Capture Risk
corruption_capture_risk.rationale: Corruption and capture directly undermine integrity. High weight reflects direct impact on power-accountability correlation.

civil_rights_equal_protection.label: Civil Rights & Equal Protection
civil_rights_equal_protection.rationale: Differential enforcement reveals structural integrity failures. Weight reflects diagnostic value rather than policy preference.

public_safety_legitimacy.label: Public Safety Legitimacy
public_safety_legitimacy.rationale: Public safety institutions are primary points of civilian-government contact. Legitimacy deficits surface early here.

national_mii.description: Population-weighted state average with federal overlay
